name: Image Classifier (CNN)
description: A powerful Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based on the ResNet18 architecture. Ideal for image classification tasks.

parameters.name: n_estimators
parameters.label: Epochs
parameters.help: An epoch is one full pass through the entire training dataset. (Default: 10)

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.label: Batch Size
parameters.help: The number of images to process at one time. A smaller batch size uses less memory. (Default: 32)

parameters.name: learning_rate
parameters.label: Learning Rate
parameters.help: Controls how much the model's weights are adjusted during training. This is a critical parameter. (Default: 0.001)
